医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
以微生物组为导向的食品可促进儿童营养研究人员重建了肠道细菌基因组。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Microbiome-directed-foods-boost-child-nutrition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Microbiome-directed-foods-boost-child-nutrition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8cff3c70-42dc-4059-a4f6-1062e6c7617b Mon, 21 Aug 2023 10:53:00 -0400 Microbiome-directed foods boost child nutrition
MIND 饮食对认知的影响三年饮食干预对老年人认知能力下降的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/The-cognitive-effects-of-the-MIND-diet.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/The-cognitive-effects-of-the-MIND-diet.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ab527435-697b-4fff-a0fd-56baa56967d6 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 10:20:00 -0400 The cognitive effects of the MIND diet
长期新冠疫情是否导致英国劳动力市场不活跃？研究人员调查了英国工作年龄成年人的长期新冠疫情与随后的劳动力市场结果之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Has-Long-Covid-contributed-to-labor-market-inactivity-in-the-UK.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Has-Long-Covid-contributed-to-labor-market-inactivity-in-the-UK.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=872c9a35-da35-41b6-9c96-ec7efe30db21 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 10:18:00 -0400 Has Long Covid contributed to labor market inactivity in the UK?
在 COVID-19 大流行期间，婴儿的肠道微生物组组成是否发生了变化？最近的一项研究比较了 COVID-19 大流行之前和期间的婴儿肠道微生物组组成。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Did-the-gut-microbiome-composition-of-infants-change-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Did-the-gut-microbiome-composition-of-infants-change-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39d235de-4dba-4484-8710-7f70825d3012 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 10:12:00 -0400 Did the gut microbiome composition of infants change during the COVID-19 pandemic?
基于人工智能的新筛查策略使用心电图来检测心脏缺陷研究人员探索利用人工智能来提高使用 12 导联心电图进行 ASD 常规筛查的效率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/New-AI-based-screening-strategy-uses-ECG-to-detect-heart-defects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/New-AI-based-screening-strategy-uses-ECG-to-detect-heart-defects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=95c737d3-4eec-4f24-904f-da8d55f22bb6 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 10:06:00 -0400 New AI-based screening strategy uses ECG to detect heart defects
低剂量率暴露于电离辐射对癌症风险的影响长期暴露于低剂量电离辐射对癌症死亡率的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/The-effect-of-low-dose-rate-exposure-to-ionising-radiation-on-the-risk-of-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/The-effect-of-low-dose-rate-exposure-to-ionising-radiation-on-the-risk-of-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50b9cf8e-dc28-4ce5-8c50-2314e6d2391f Mon, 21 Aug 2023 09:58:00 -0400 The effect of low dose rate exposure to ionising radiation on the risk of cancer
COVID-19 与罹患各种自身免疫性疾病的风险增加有关，并且可以通过疫苗接种来降低风险COVID-19 会增加各种自身免疫性疾病的风险；然而，通过接种 COVID-19 疫苗似乎可以减轻这种风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/COVID-19-linked-with-increased-risk-of-developmenting-various-autoimmune-diseases-and-risk-could-be-attenuated-by-疫苗接种.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/COVID-19-linked-with-increased-risk-of-developmenting-various-autoimmune-diseases-and-risk-could-be-attenuated-by-疫苗接种.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3de8b1cc-38ae-4488-b96f-0f18a0c0006a Mon, 21 Aug 2023 09:56:00 -0400 COVID-19 associated with increased risk of developing various autoimmune diseases and risk could be attenuated by vaccination

睡眠呼吸障碍与阿尔茨海默病之间是否存在关联？研究人员评估了睡眠呼吸障碍（SDB）对阿尔茨海默病（AD）神经影像生物标志物的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Is-there-an-association- Between-sleep-disordered-breathing-and-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Is-there-an-association- Between-sleep-disordered-breathing-and-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25aedada-9c51-4510-aa7f-3d569db11d1e Mon, 21 Aug 2023 09:34:00 -0400 Is there an association between sleep-disordered breathing and Alzheimer's disease?
